thread.title: Sweet 16 awaits on Tuesday for ECHS, Newnan, Northgate
thread.title_full: Sweet 16 awaits on Tuesday for ECHS, Newnan, Northgate

title: Sweet 16 awaits on Tuesday for ECHS, Newnan, Northgate
text:
Sweet 16 awaits on Tuesday for ECHS, Newnan, Northgate by Comments 
When East Coweta, Newnan and Northgate played first-round GHSA state volleyball matches last week, all three schools came away with a sweep of respective opponents. 
Action continues Tuesday in the GHSA Sweet 16 with East Coweta hosting North Gwinnett and Newnan trav- eling to Area 7 champion Norcross. 
Northgate continues its Class tournament run by hosting Winder-Barrow. 
East Coweta (22-20) is try- ing to get back to the Class Final Four of the second year in a row. The Lady Indians rolled past Tucker 3-0 last week. 
Newnan first-year head coach Krista Wilson guided the Lady Cougars (29-16) the regular-season title and the county championship, but lost twice to East Coweta in the Region 3- tournament. 
The Lady Cougars opened state tournament play with a 3-0 sweep of Rockdale. 
Northgate (27-18) captured its first-region tournament last week with a win over state power McIntosh and advanced to the Class tournament as the No. 1 seed out of Region 4- . 
The Lady Vikings kept the momentum with a 3-0 victory over Druid Hills. 
East Coweta takes on a North Gwinnett (36-9) team 
which advanced to the second round after beating Chattahoochee 3-1. 
Norcross (33-14) set up its date at home against Newnan with a 3-0 win over Parkview. Winder-Barrow (35-21) set up its second-round game against Northgate with a 3-0 sweep over Chapel Hill. 
East Coweta comes into its second-round contest get- ting solid play from its three seniors. 
Sydney Winters has 290 kills, and Dominique Ingram 274. Peyton Smith has 616 assists. 
Newnan’s Jenni Young has been the team’s floor leader this season. Young has 197 kills. Callie Bass has 144 digs and Olivia Masonheimer has 86 blocks. 
Northgate’s Taylor Richard comes into the second round of the tournament with 277 kills, while team- mate Katie Stanton has 239. Stanton is also the team’s top server with 79 aces. Savannah Moore has 99 blocks. 
Teams will be re-seeded for the third round in both the Class and brackets with the higher seeded team hosting the Elite 8 best-of-five contest. More
